attributes.background: Tommy Robinson has campaigned tirelessly against child grooming gangs and extremism. He has done this often under threat of physical injury or death. Although he has not been heeded by the establishment, all his warnings have come true. He deserves recognition from the British people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
